overview: A window into Russia, unknown to Western man, and even to many Russians. "Russia - the largest country in the world. In many of its parts, it remains unknown world full of wonders. Let the world and will continue for the generations that come after us".
title: Russia - In the Realm of Tigers, Bears and Volcanoes
